headline.main: New Cigarette Designed To Cut Perils in Smoke; Patents: Cigarette Is designed to Cut Smoke Perils

docs.abstract: Eugene O Keizer of RCA Laboratories receives patent for record that carries half hr of color TV pictures and sound on each side; disk spins at 450 revolutions per minute, as compared with 33 1/3 for most audio records (M)

byline.original: By STACY V. JONES Special to The New York Times

keywords.value: TOBACCO, TOBACCO PRODUCTS AND SMOKERS ARTICLES
